title: So you want to learn to climb the ladder?
body:
You are going to need a tool which I will supply you with here in a moment.
So I am always on here and I can't help notice a thread about elo hell/how to climb every so often.

So you really want to learn to climb from your bronze shit league to at least gold shit league?
Here is how you do it. You queue for a solo ranked game. Once you get in your search everyone on your team up with http://na.op.gg/ 
If they have a fishy amount of recent games that don't look too good you take your 3lp loss dodge.

Now congratulate yourself for being successful on dodging a bad team and most likely losing 20 LP for losing like most toads will do.
Using this method you will find your with a 60% win rate which is enough to climb divisions.
